com.google.crypto.tink.subtle

Class DjbCipher

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.google.crypto.tink.subtle.DjbCipher
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IndCpaCipher

    @Alpha
public abstract class DjbCipher
extends Object
implements IndCpaCipher
    Abstract base class for class of Djb's ciphers.

    Class of Djb's ciphers that are meant to be used to construct an AEAD with Poly1305.

    • Method Detail

      • encrypt

        public byte[] encrypt(byte[] plaintext)
               throws GeneralSecurityException
        Description copied from interface: IndCpaCipher
        Encrypts plaintext. The resulting ciphertext is indistinguishable under chosen-plaintext attack. However, it does not have integrity protection.
        Specified by:
        encrypt in interface IndCpaCipher

        the resulting ciphertext.
